question: What is the main difference between a StatefulSet and a Deployment in Kubernetes?
answers: StatefulSet provides unique network identities to its pods while Deployment does not
Deployment ensures fixed IP addresses for its pods while StatefulSet does not
StatefulSet supports horizontal scaling while Deployment does not
Deployment can be used only for stateful applications while StatefulSet is for stateless applications

it: Quale dei seguenti è un servizio di calcolo serverless completamente gestito in AWS?

Deployment garantisce indirizzi IP fissi per i suoi pod mentre StatefulSet no
StatefulSet supporta lo scaling orizzontale mentre Deployment no
Deployment può essere utilizzato solo per applicazioni stateful mentre StatefulSet è per applicazioni stateless
